reviews.review_text: Awesome place run by awesome people. Great food and atmosphere. They catered my daughter and son in law's wedding reception, and it was excellent.

I've been here a couple times before, when they had the murals/art along the walls of the entrance. Sadly, as of Jan 2024, they do not. Could have been removed earlier as well. Definitely a loss.

Went here for lunch in a group of 10. The atmosphere was laid back as expected. Food was definitely good.

A few items were taken off the menu. Surprisingly, they only had ice cream for dessert, so we skipped it.

The fried chicken was way too oily, and bland. It was so bad that we could not eat it.
The beef roast was my favourite. Damn tender.

Place was not crowded.
There was a nice breeze.
Washrooms could use a cleaning.

Nostalgic & iconic place for authentic goan food. Their chilly chicken , and  stuffed crabs are all time favourite need
to try their stuff crab ü¶Ä

Very budget friendly restaurant.
